Rebekah (Bek) Maurice is an illustrator and graphic designer known for her hand-lettering. Her motto is “Illustrating the words we need to hear” and she runs BEK Design, a stationery and lifestyle brand that aims to inspire optimism, support mental health and encourage self care.
